articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: US deploys more troops to Djibouti for possible Sudan evacuation - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: US preparing to send additional troops to nearby Djibouti in case an evacuation of Americans from Sudan is needed.
articles.content:
The United States is preparing to send a large number of additional troops to its military base in Djibouti in case of an eventual emergency evacuation from Sudan of American citizens.
